name: Jason Lo Hog Tian
title: Show Host
bio: Hi everyone! My name is Jason and I'm a show host for Season 5 of Raw Talk Podcast! I'm a third year PhD student at the Institute of Medical Science investigating how stigma impacts the health and wellbeing of people living with HIV. I'm passionate about scientific communication and I listen to a variety of audiobooks and podcasts of course! I'm super excited to be working with the team and look forward to sharing interesting science research with you!
